name: Deadline!!
description:
Theme: it's not Supposed To Do That!

#BYOG_2022

A Zombie Boss is still 'The Boss'!! When it comes to the 'Deadline' you have to work even if your brain does not! Only person to eat all your brains is indeed your BOSS!

Heal your lazy-Zombiefied employees and get them to work, before they run away breaking the door!
